summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD EXPLORER. WHILE DRIVING 75 MPH, THE POWER STEERING BECAME LOOSE, AND THE SERVICE ADVANCETRAC AND SERVICE POWER STEERING WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT PARKED AT A NEARBY RESTAURANT. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER (PALM SPRINGS MOTORS LOCATED AT 69200 CA-111, CATHEDRAL CITY, CA 92234; (760) 328-2102) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE STEERING WHEEL ASSEMBLY NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 800-392-3673 AND OPENED CASE NUMBER: CAS-12599770. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 62,988.
